title: Old Mutual says not backing down in case against fired CEO
text:
Old Mutual says not backing down in case against fired CEO

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 13, 2019 11:40)

© Reuters. Old Mutual says not backing down in case against fired CEO JOHANNESBURG, Sept 13 (Reuters) - Old Mutual (LON: ) said on Friday it was not backing down in a dispute with its fired CEO, after confirming it had sent a letter to the CEO's attorneys saying it would not seek further court intervention on his second letter of termination. Fired CEO Peter Moyo turned up for work on Monday but was again prevented from resuming his duties despite a court ruling last week that dismissed the South African insurer's attempt to block his temporary reinstatement. Mutual has twice dismissed Moyo. Its letter on Thursday signalled it would not pursue court action over its second letter of termination to Moyo, while continuing action on the first.
